tool_description: Stock Market Breadth API for the US and Global Stock Markets

api_list.name: Market Breadth
api_list.description: Provides market breadth data for various stock exchanges, allowing users to analyze market trends and performance.

required_parameters.name: exchange
required_parameters.description: The stock exchange to query data from. Options include NYSE, Nasdaq, TSX, LSE, ASX, NSE, TYO, HKEX, SHSE, SZSE.

required_parameters.name: series
required_parameters.description: The specific market breadth series to retrieve. Options include various moving averages and indicators.

optional_parameters.name: bar
optional_parameters.description: Number of the most recent bar to retrieve.

optional_parameters.name: format
optional_parameters.description: The format of the response data. Options are CSV or JSON.

optional_parameters.name: to
optional_parameters.description: The end date for the data retrieval.

optional_parameters.name: from
optional_parameters.description: The start date for the data retrieval.
